description: This file defines a Flutter StatelessWidget called ListingScreen, which displays a vintage-styled list of books using a grid layout. It composes various widgets such as AppShell, VintageBackground, AppSearchBar, and BookCard to build the UI, and references mock data and configuration settings.

classes.name: ListingScreen
classes.description: A Flutter widget representing a listings page with vintage styling, featuring a search bar and a grid of book cards.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the ListingScreen, displaying a grid of books with vintage background.
